interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: It’S SKIN Signature D’escargot Unwrinkle Snail Cream 55ml 1.86 fl. oz. - Anti Aging Wrinkle Care Skin Tightening Repair Moisturizing Essence for Youthful Appearance Mucin Serum Gel
Review Date: 2018/11/14
Store: It’s Skin
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'It’s Skin', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.8598 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Mature', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Review Text: I've heard of face cream made from snails (or their secretions) and was a bit hesitant to give it a try. This is from Korea so perhaps that's not so surprising, and has a nice citrus scent to it, is a nice thick cream (no SPF) that does a really good job moisturizing my skin. It absorbs quickly and gives it a nice, dewy look and does seem to provide some tightness to it.
Review Title: yes, snail cream
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
LumaRx Facial Cleansing Brush with 1-Minute Pulsing Timer and LED Speed Indicator Light, Rechargeable and Showerproof, White/Silver
{'Material': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'LumaRx', 'Color': 'White/Silver', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '3.88 x 7 x 10 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '074590543216', 'Manufacturer': 'LumaRx'}
I'm pretty happy about the LumaRx facial cleansing brush. It is designed very ergonomically and is very comfortable to hold during use. The tool is extremely lightweight and has a tapered design which makes it so comfortable to use. The instructions are to use it for a minute each morning and evening. It has illustrations which show you to spend 20 seconds on the right side and 20 seconds on the left side and 20 seconds on the T-zone. The tool will actually buzz gently when you should move to the next area. This is a great feature! It also comes with 3 brush heads; massage, sensitive and normal skin. I am using the sensitive for now and it is perfect for a gentle exfoliation. When I am finished with that minute, my skin just glows and feels so clean! Hopefully the heads do not need replaced quickly as I do not think they are yet available on Amazon or online. It also comes with a sleek charger that does not take up any room at all on the counter – this is important to me as I have a small bathroom. Also, the LumaRx comes with a very nice carrying case that will come in handy for an upcoming vacation.
Exciting product for smooth and glowing skin
It’S SKIN Signature D’escargot Unwrinkle Snail Cream 55ml 1.86 fl. oz. - Anti Aging Wrinkle Care Skin Tightening Repair Moisturizing Essence for Youthful Appearance Mucin Serum Gel
It’s Skin

I've heard of face cream made from snails (or their secretions) and was a bit hesitant to give it a try. This is from Korea so perhaps that's not so surprising, and has a nice citrus scent to it, is a nice thick cream (no SPF) that does a really good job moisturizing my skin. It absorbs quickly and gives it a nice, dewy look and does seem to provide some tightness to it.
yes, snail cream
profile:
### User Profile Summary

**General Preferences:**
- Values ergonomics and comfort in product design.
- Prioritizes lightweight and space-saving features, particularly in small living spaces.
- Appreciates products with clear, user-friendly instructions and intuitive functionality.

**Product Focus:**
- Interest in facial cleansing tools, particularly those that enhance skincare routines.
- Preference for gentle exfoliation suited for sensitive skin.
- Looks for products with multiple functionality (e.g., different brush heads).
- Recently expanded interest to include moisturizing products with anti-aging benefits.

**Desired Outcomes:**
- Goals include achieving smooth, glowing skin and maintaining cleanliness.
- Enjoys features that promote routine adherence (e.g., built-in timers).
- Seeks hydration and skin tightening effects along with improved appearance.

**Shopping Considerations:**
- Product sustainability and availability of replacement parts are important.
- Interest in accessories that enhance product usability, such as carrying cases.
- Open to incorporating unique ingredients that provide beneficial skincare properties.

**Future Intents:**
- Likely to consider travel-friendly beauty tools.
- May seek out other devices that prioritize skin health and convenience, with a focus on lightweight and ergonomic design.
- Shows a willingness to experiment with innovative skincare formulations that have proven results.
